name: Mystic city of Caveroon
description:
old 3D mini game that i made for OxGame challenge back in 2011, using basic free for use game maker assets game have no music since new GM do not allow midi file

Controls: 
-to move use arrows 
-page down and delete key will rotate the camera 
-pick things up by space bar 
-interact by pressing enter

if you like my work please consider becoming a patreon even as much as a 1$ is a lot of help.
https://www.patreon.com/Lionx
